summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Low Income Elderly and Handicapped Housing Program; authorizing the issuance and sale of up to $55,000,000 principal amount of general obligation refunding bonds of the City for the purpose of providing part of the funds necessary to refund all or a part of the City's outstanding Unlimited Tax General Obligation Bonds; 1982; authorizing the purchase of certain obligations with the proceeds of the sale of such refunding bonds and for the use and application of the funds to be derived from such obligation; providing for the redemption of certain outstanding bonds to be refunded and for a refunding agent; etc.
